feature.name: Ki
feature.extensionDescription: You can use your ki to duplicate the effects of certain spells.

effect.name: Darkness
effect.actionDescription: You can cause darkness to spread from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for up to ten minutes.
effect.shortDescription: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can’t see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can’t illuminate it. If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn’t being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness. If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

effect.name: Darkvision
effect.actionDescription: You can touch a willing creature and cause it to have darkvision to 60 feet for 8 hours.
effect.shortDescription: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For the duration of 8 hours, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

effect.name: Pass without Trace
effect.actionDescription: As an action, you cast a veil of shadows, masking you and your companions from detection for 1 hour.
effect.shortDescription: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For 1 hour, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can’t be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.

effect.name: Silence
effect.actionDescription: As an action, you create a silent sphere centered on a point you choose that lasts for 10 minutes.
effect.shortDescription: For 10 minutes, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and creatures are deafened while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a verbal component is impossible there.

feature.name: Shadow Step
feature.shortDescription: You gain the ability to step from one shadow into another. When you are in dim light or darkness, as a bonus action you can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in dim light or darkness. You then have advantage on the first melee attack you make before the end of the turn.

effect.name: Invisible- Cloak of Shadows
effect.actionDescription: When you are in an area of dim light or darkness, you can use your action to become invisible.
effect.shortDescription: You remain invisible until you make an attack, cast a spell, or are in an area of bright light.

feature.name: Opportunist
feature.shortDescription: You can exploit a creature's momentary distraction when it is hit by an attack. Whenever a creature within 5 feet of you is hit by an attack made by a creature other than you, you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against that creature.
